children.text: In this program, interns made virtual scenes in Unreal and combined with motion-captured live action data to complete a short film.

children.title: Unreal Engine Tutorials
children.text: Most interns were new to Unreal, we guided them through VP pipeline/workflow from beginner's level, including skills such as workspace introductions, project setups, function essentials and scene creation.

children.title: Group Projects
children.text: 8 interns together created two videos, product animation and character animation.

children.title: Motion Capture
children.text: For character animations, interns themselves suited up for motion capture, then brought their motions into Unreal Engine to create short films.

children.text: After the two-week course, trainees had one more week to complete their own projects. On the last day of the program, the final presentation was held on site in the studios and reviewed by senior artists from Moonshine

For this training program, we partnered up with professionals in the filming & entertainment industry.With guidance from senior staff members, trainees helped create scenes for a short film and a music video.

children.title: Unreal Engine Tutorials
children.text: Most interns were new to Unreal, we guided them through VP pipeline/workflow from beginner's level, including skills such as workspace introductions, project setups, function essentials and scene creation.

children.title: Project-oriented Scene Creation
children.text: Trainees were separated into two groups to make movie and music videos. Each team had to create several scenes based on the director’s need.

children.title: On Site Filming
children.text: The final projects were filmed on set with professionals directing. Trainees took their first step into the field and began their VP journeys.
